articles.title: Photos: Something in the Way music fest at Roadrunner, Day 1
articles.description:
Boston.com photographer Ben Stas caught the indie magic in all its glory at the first day of the two-day festival.

The post Photos: Something in the Way music fest at Roadrunner, Day 1 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Something in the Way music festival kicked off at Roadrunner on January 31, 2026.

The two-day event enhances Boston's vibrant music scene and supports local artists.

articles.title: Patriots fullback Jack Westover says his sister bet Super Bowl LX matchup in training camp
articles.description:
"The payout happened to be $18,000."

summary: Patriots fullback Jack Westover revealed his sister's Super Bowl LX bet during training camp.
The bet resulted in an $18,000 payout for Westover's sister.
This highlights the growing interest in sports betting among Boston residents.

articles.title: Watch: Mike Vrabel and Drake Maye address crowd at Patriots’ send-off rally

articles.title: ‘SNL’ recap: Best moments from Alexander Skarsgård hosting ‘Saturday Night Live’

articles.title: Red Sox’ Jovani Morán denied insurance amid WBC uncertainty
articles.description:
Amid lefthander Jovani Morán’s quest to win a spot in the Red Sox bullpen, a twist in the subplot: He has been denied insurance to participate in the World Baseball Classic, making him an unlikely member of Puerto Rico’s squad for the March tournament. According to a league source, the players’ union recently informed Morán […]

The post Red Sox’ Jovani Morán denied insurance amid WBC uncertainty appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jovani Morán denied insurance to play in the World Baseball Classic.
Morán's participation in the March tournament for Puerto Rico is now uncertain.
This decision affects the Red Sox bullpen depth and local fan expectations.
